meaning_str.bing:
n. 污垢；泥；〈非正式〉丑闻
网络. 尘埃；泥土；污物

污物；灰尘；尘土；污垢；泥土；烂泥；肮脏（状态）；淫秽内容；污言秽语；下流行为；<非正式>丑闻；八卦消息；<非正式>排泄物；粪便；可鄙的人；<矿>含金泥

1.en: Decontamination of cleaning agents can only be used for more oil and a large number of serious dirt accumulation areas.
1.cn: 去污性更强的清洁剂只能用于油脂和大量污垢严重堆积的区域。

2.en: There was a narrow dirt path that led directly through the meadow to the door of a quaint-looking house built at the edge of the woods.
2.cn: 有一条从草地直接通往森林旁边古色古香房门口的狭窄的泥路。

3.en: Second, as if any more proof was needed, the book throws the last few shovelfuls of dirt on the Efficient Market Hypothesis (EMT).
3.cn: 第二，假如还需要什么证据的话，这本书就是对有效市场假说最后的否定。

0.en: I like dirt and rocks and facts. No argument here.
0.cn: 我更喜欢脚踏实地货真价实。这我也同意。

1.en: Heck, give me a peck of dirt any day of the week.
1.cn: 那随时给我盖一把黄土吧。

2.en: You've got dirt on your nose by the way. Did you know?
2.cn: 对了，你鼻子有块脏东西，你知道吗？

3.en: That thing's made of dirt. Are we sure it didn't just rain?
3.cn: 那里都是用土建起来的。你确定不是只是下雨而已吗？

4.en: Give it too much, you'll be outta the dirt and into the tulips.
4.cn: 如果你开太快的话就会滑出去

5.en: What 12-year-old boy wants a motorized dirt bike? All of them? Really? Yeah.
5.cn: 一个怎么样的12岁男孩会要辆摩托车？所有的。真的？是的。

6.en: A radioactive buried under dirt as if it had never existed like District 13.
6.cn: 放射性物质弥漫全城，只剩下死亡，如同消失的13区。

7.en: One day, you will perish. You will lie with the rest of your kind in the dirt.
7.cn: 终有一天你将消亡，你将和自己的同类一起葬于黄土之下。

8.en: Hi. I'm gal pal Rachel Green, and if you want the dirt, I'm the one you come too.
8.cn: 嗨，我是女性朋友瑞秋格林，你想知道八卦消息就来找我，这可能是乔伊的孩子，谁知道呢？

9.en: How a boy grew up in a dirt-poor shithole and climbed his way out through hard work.
9.cn: 一位出身贫寒的少年是如何努力工作攀上人生巅峰。

10.en: This ain't asphalt, son. This is dirt. Oh, great. What do you want? You here to gloat?
10.cn: 这不是柏油路，这是泥路。唉，你又想要干嘛？你是来炫耀的吗？

11.en: He'd been left with the ability to play the gentleman, but he was once again dirt-poor.
11.cn: 他表面上还能继续扮绅士，但实际上，他又一次身无分文了。

12.en: Did you even hear the dirt that happened over break? Who would I have heard it from? Dorota?
12.cn: 假期里你有没听说到一些八卦新闻？你说我可以从谁那里打听？朵箩塔吗？

13.en: His parents were dirt-poor farmers from North Dakota. But he never accepted them as his parents at all.
13.cn: 他的父母是北达科他州身无分文的农民，但他从不认他们为自己的父母。

14.en: Come on, you guys. Tell me all the dirt. Well, the biggest news is still you dumping Barry at the altar.
14.cn: 好了，你们快点跟我讲八卦。最大的八卦，还是你在圣坛前抛下贝瑞。

15.en: Anything you can find, dirt or past arrests. Maybe he has a drinking problem. I am not a dirty stinking Jew!
15.cn: 丑事，被捕记录，什么都要，或许他还酗酒，我才不是肮脏恶心的犹太人。

16.en: Really bad bumpy dirt road, Riley, with no lights and a cliff, and some sort of weird hitchhiker with a banjo!
16.cn: 你干嘛非得选这条路走啊，又脏又崎岖，在悬崖边，没有灯，路边还有拿着班卓琴想搭便车的怪人！

17.en: Then my friends are there. Covered in dirt and grass eaten by worms. I don't want to have to visit my sons here.
17.cn: 然后吾友们长眠于此，泥草覆身，虫蛆啃噬。我不想探望我崽于此。

18.en: Instead of a titanium centrifuge, my parents bought me, wow, this is hard. They got me a motorized dirt bike. No!
18.cn: 然而我父母却给我买了一个...真是难以启齿，他们给我买了一辆摩托车。不会吧。

19.en: Hear. To a peck of dirt. Hear. I will drink to that, but I will also drink to the general, a good servant. To the general.
19.cn: 说得好。敬黄土。说得好。我要敬这一杯，也要敬将军一杯他是位优秀的公仆。敬将军。
